resources.string:
Welcome to our weather app! Stay
 informed with accurate weather forecasts
 and easily check current weather
 conditions.

Experience the perfect blend of
 nature and music, with
 soothing tunes that helps you relax!

Get useful weather tips and
 recommendations to make the most
 of your day, keeping you prepare for
 any weather conditions!
Application is informing you about the app, that gives you many services and important information for safer and efficient use.
I declare I have read and accepted the following condition of use.
If we find the app is being used outside its terms of use, we may restrict access to it.
Any type of modification to the app or its components is not allowed.
Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time for any reason. We will notify you of any changes to our Privacy Policy by posting the new Privacy Policy here.
We do not share any kind of your Personal Data with third parties.
You can find out more information by clicking on the

Posting rules you should be taking care of before you start interaction on our website/application: Weather Forecast 
 
Assuring you carry the rights and eligibility to post any form of content you are about to share. We never permit nudism on application/website. 
 
We won't allow posting of sexually explicit content, sexually explicit text, images, or audio content depicting extreme sexual acts such as acts of posting Content that drives traffic to pornographic online services. Please note that we may make exceptions based on artistic, educational, historical, documentary, or scientific nature, or where there are other considerable benefits to the public at large. 
 
We don't permit encouragement or applaud towards terrorism, formed crime scenes or hate association groups on our application/website. Attempting to sell sexual services or weapons and harmful drugs are also not permitted. We will remove reasonable threats of severity, hate arousing content/speech and the intentionally pointing of private individuals. We do not permit attacks/abuse based on skin colour, native, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, religion, disability or disease. 
 
Graphic violence is not allowed and we may remove videos or images of intense, graphic violence to make sure our application/website stays appropriate for everyone. 
 
If anyone or any account is spotted doing the above restricted activities they can be booked and arrested for the same. If viewers spot any violations of the above rules they have the right to report the content to us by using the report feature given in our application/ website.
